attributes.action: The government should deliver the EU withdrawal that was voted for in June 2016.
attributes.additional_details: The referendum was "in or out", not half in! Other MPs who come across as well principled, honest and genuine and say Britain could aim for a WTO withdrawal from the EU. A good starting point to begin a real negotiation. No need to send £39B(!) of hard working tax payers money to the EU. No need to become a vassal state. A much better deal for the UK must be possible. If not, no deal no problem.
attributes.background: Theresa May has lied to the British public since becoming Prime Minister. She has wasted two and a half years only to present a deal with the EU that betrays the hard working British people. With the UK's huge trade deficit, the average person has been left feeling they could negotiate a better deal

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
